ComicInfo.Title: Wings in the Night!; The Chains That Bind!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Wings in the Night!: A scientific experiment on nightmares causes a demon to be formed that attacks sleeping New Yorkers. Thor puts an end to its destruction.
The Chains That Bind!: Loki talks Odin into removing the chain that binds him to Sigyn.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:27:29. [Issue ID 35354]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: The Dream Demon (villain, introduction, death),Lionel Jeffries,Eugene Beaumont,Loki (cameo, dream),Thor,Milton Meilicki,Odin (cameo, dream),Sif (cameo, dream),Balder (cameo, dream),Ramon Hernandez
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Kupperberg,Chic Stone,Keith Pollard,Alan Kupperberg,Chic Stone,Keith Pollard
